pages.text: The $(bold)Mirrored Amulet$() solves the problem of inventory space, by providing access to remote storage on-the-go. Simply link it to a chest, or any other inventory by sneak-right-clicking, and equip. An additional set of inventory slots will appear in your inventory screen, corresponding to those slots in the inventory, which could be part of a storage system.

You can take this one step further, by enchanting it with $(bold)Pessimist's Will$(). An enchanted amulet will send the user's items to the linked inventory upon their death - except for the amulet, which is left behind.
